import React from 'react' import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import ChatContent from './components/ChatContent/ChatContent' import useChat from './logic/useChat' import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' const Chat = () => { const {isLoading,error,messages} = useChat() const {state} = useLocation(); return (

{state.frieName}

) } export default Chat
